about_the_game:
The bizarre adventure of "u" continues after he is woken from a coma by a help of a stranger, only to find himself an amnesiac in a world controlled by powerful evil forces. In the wake of realizing that his life has been a lie and he has been living in a dream, he must now confront the real world that is being ruled by a formidable villain who has unleashed his army to take over the TVs world.



Game Story:

TVs The Revival is a platformer side-scroller single-player game that's a sequel to "TVs The Awakening." There's nothing quite like it! balancing exciting action with challenging puzzles, this game makes for an engaging experience. Playing as "u," you wake up in the world of TV and must take the realities of it head-on as you encounter strange events during gameplay. A mystery plagues his life, and he must solve intricate puzzles until the truth is revealed.



Game Characters

The objective of this part of the game is to provide "u" with a glimpse of the evil side of TVs world which is depicted as "The Great Tower" and reveal his character to uncover shocking revelations. As he explores the game environment, he will discover more about the mysterious character who appears on TV and radio to guide him.

How to Play

To free his world and restore his memory, the player must destroy "The Great Tower", a transmission tower. The player must pass through a series of levels, solving a variety of puzzles from spatial puzzles to decisions, until he makes it to the boss level, where defeating him puts an end to the level, enabling him to proceed further.

Throughout the game, you will run, jump, crouch, hang, and most importantly, you'll need good timing to solve the puzzles. Take note of the small details; they may hold a clue.
